TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed UnicodeCategory extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定義字元的 Unicode 分類。

span.span: Defines the Unicode category of a character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成員列舉型別由和方法。A member of the enumeration is returned by the and methods. 列舉型別也用來支援方法，例如。The enumeration is also used to support methods, such as . 這類方法會判斷指定的字元是否為特定的 Unicode 一般分類的成員。Such methods determine whether a specified character is a member of a particular Unicode general category. Unicode 一般分類中定義的字元，也就是指定為字母、 十進位數字、 分隔符號、 數學符號、 標點符號、 等一種廣泛的分類。A Unicode general category defines the broad classification of a character, that is, designation as a type of letter, decimal digit, separator, mathematical symbol, punctuation, and so on. 這個列舉型別依據 Unicode Standard、 5.0 版。This enumeration is based on The Unicode Standard, version 5.0. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Unicode Character Database](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57650) 中的 "UCD File Format" 和 "General Category Values" 副標題。For more information, see the "UCD File Format" and "General Category Values" subtopics at the [Unicode Character Database](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57650). Unicode 標準定義下列項目：The Unicode Standard defines the following: Surrogate 字組是順序的包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位為高 surrogate，而第二個是順序的低 surrogate 是順序的單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示。A surrogate pair is a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. 高 surrogate 是 Unicode 字碼指標 U + D800 到 U + DBFF 範圍內，且為低 surrogate Unicode 字碼指標 U + DC00 到 U + DFFF 範圍中。A high surrogate is a Unicode code point in the range U+D800 through U+DBFF and a low surrogate is a Unicode code point in the range U+DC00 through U+DFFF. A 結合字元序列是基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。A combining character sequence is a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. Surrogate 字組代表基底字元或組合字元。A surrogate pair represents a base character or a combining character. 間距或非間距組合字元。A combining character is either spacing or nonspacing. 間距組合字元佔用本身進行轉譯時，而非間距組合字元沒有間距位置。A spacing combining character takes up a spacing position by itself when rendered, while a nonspacing combining character does not. 變音符號是非間距組合字元的範例。Diacritics are an example of nonspacing combining characters. 修飾詞字母是表示，組合字元，例如修改前導字母的獨立式間距字元。A modifier letter is a free-standing spacing character that, like a combining character, indicates modifications of a preceding letter. 封入標示為非間距組合字元圍住所有先前字元最多並包括基底的字元。An enclosing mark is a nonspacing combining character that surrounds all previous characters up to and including a base character. 格式字元是的字元，一般不會呈現，但會影響文字版面配置或文字處理的作業。A format character is a character that is not normally rendered but that affects the layout of text or the operation of text processes. Unicode 標準定義數個變化某些標點符號。The Unicode Standard defines several variations to some punctuation marks. 例如，可以是表示連字號，例如 U + 002D （連字號減號） 或 U + 00AD 的幾個程式碼值的其中一個連字號 （選擇性連字號） 或 U + 2010 （連字號） 或 U + 2011 （分行的連字號）。For example, a hyphen can be one of several code values that represent a hyphen, such as U+002D (hyphen-minus) or U+00AD (soft hyphen) or U+2010 (hyphen) or U+2011 (nonbreaking hyphen). 上述同樣適用於連字號、 空格字元和引號。The same is true for dashes, space characters, and quotation marks. Unicode 標準也會將指派代碼表示的專屬於指定的指令碼或語言，比方說，是 U + 0030 （數字為零） 的十進位數字和 U + 0660 （阿拉伯數字為零）。The Unicode Standard also assigns codes to representations of decimal digits that are specific to a given script or language, for example, U+0030 (digit zero) and U+0660 (Arabic-Indic digit zero). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示 UppercaseLetter 類別目錄中的字元和其相對應的字碼指標的字元。The following example displays the characters and their corresponding code points for characters in the UppercaseLetter category. 您可以修改範例以顯示在任何其他類別的代號中指派給, 您感興趣的類別以取代 UppercaseLetter`category`變數。You can modify the example to display the letters in any other category by replacing UppercaseLetter with the category of interest to you in the assignment to the `category` variable. 請注意，某些分類的輸出可能很長。Note that the output for some categories can be extensive. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory/cs/Characters1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory/vb/Characters1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory ClosePunctuation = int32(21)

summary.span: 一個成對標點符號的開閉字元 (例如括弧、方括弧和大括弧)。

span.span: Closing character of one of the paired punctuation marks, such as parentheses, square brackets, and braces.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Pe" 表示 (標點符號、關閉)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pe" (punctuation, close).

summary.span: 值為 21。

span.span: The value is 21.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory ConnectorPunctuation = int32(18)

summary.span: 連接兩個字元的連接線標點符號字元。

span.span: Connector punctuation character that connects two characters.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Pc" 表示 (其他、連接線)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pc" (punctuation, connector).

summary.span: 值為 18。

span.span: The value is 18.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory Control = int32(14)

summary.span: Unicode 值為 U+007F 或者落在 U+0000 到 U+001F 範圍或 U+0080 到 U+009F 範圍內的控制碼字元。

span.span: Control code character, with a Unicode value of U+007F or in the range U+0000 through U+001F or U+0080 through U+009F.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Cc" 表示 (其他、控制項)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Cc" (other, control).

summary.span: 值為 14。

span.span: The value is 14.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory CurrencySymbol = int32(26)

summary.span: 貨幣符號字元。

span.span: Currency symbol character.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Sc" 表示 (符號、貨幣)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Sc" (symbol, currency).

summary.span: 值為 26。

span.span: The value is 26.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory DashPunctuation = int32(19)

summary.span: 破折號或連字號字元。

span.span: Dash or hyphen character.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Pd" 表示 (標點符號、破折號)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pd" (punctuation, dash).

summary.span: 值為 19。

span.span: The value is 19.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory DecimalDigitNumber = int32(8)

summary.span: 十進位數字字元，即 0 到 9 範圍內的字元。

span.span: Decimal digit character, that is, a character in the range 0 through 9.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Nd" 表示 (數字、十進位數字)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Nd" (number, decimal digit).

summary.span: 值為 8。

span.span: The value is 8.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory EnclosingMark = int32(7)

summary.span: 封入標記字元，即圍住所有先前字元直到基底字元 (含) 的非間距組合字元。

span.span: Enclosing mark character, which is a nonspacing combining character that surrounds all previous characters up to and including a base character.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Me" 表示 (記號、封入)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Me" (mark, enclosing).

summary.span: 值為 7。

span.span: The value is 7.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory FinalQuotePunctuation = int32(23)

summary.span: 關閉或最終引號字元。

span.span: Closing or final quotation mark character.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Pf" 表示 (標點符號、最終引號)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pf" (punctuation, final quote).

summary.span: 值為 23。

span.span: The value is 23.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory Format = int32(15)

summary.span: 影響文字版面配置或文字處理作業但一般不會呈現的格式字元。

span.span: Format character that affects the layout of text or the operation of text processes, but is not normally rendered.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Cf" 表示 (其他、格式)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Cf" (other, format).

summary.span: 值為 15。

span.span: The value is 15.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory InitialQuotePunctuation = int32(22)

summary.span: 開啟或初始引號字元。

span.span: Opening or initial quotation mark character.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Pi" 表示 (標點符號、初始引號)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pi" (punctuation, initial quote).

summary.span: 值為 22。

span.span: The value is 22.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory LetterNumber = int32(9)

summary.span: 以字母 (非十進位數字) 代表的數字 (例如，羅馬數字 5 就是 "V")。

span.span: Number represented by a letter, instead of a decimal digit, for example, the Roman numeral for five, which is "V".

summary.span: 指標是以 Unicode 指定 "Nl" 表示 (數字、字母)。

span.span: The indicator is signified by the Unicode designation "Nl" (number, letter).

summary.span: 值為 9。

span.span: The value is 9.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory LineSeparator = int32(12)

summary.span: 用來分隔文字行的字元。

span.span: Character that is used to separate lines of text.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Zl" 表示 (分隔符號、行)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Zl" (separator, line).

summary.span: 值為 12。

span.span: The value is 12.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory LowercaseLetter = int32(1)

summary.span: 小寫字母。

span.span: Lowercase letter.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Ll" 表示 (字母、大寫)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Ll" (letter, lowercase).

summary.span: 值為 1。

span.span: The value is 1.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory MathSymbol = int32(25)

summary.span: 數學符號字元 (例如 "+" 或 "= ")。

span.span: Mathematical symbol character, such as "+" or "= ".

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Sm" 表示 (符號、數學)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Sm" (symbol, math).

summary.span: 值為 25。

span.span: The value is 25.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory ModifierLetter = int32(3)

summary.span: 修飾詞字母字元，這是表示修改前導字母的獨立式間距字元。

span.span: Modifier letter character, which is free-standing spacing character that indicates modifications of a preceding letter.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Lm" 表示 (字母、修飾詞)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Lm" (letter, modifier).

summary.span: 值為 3。

span.span: The value is 3.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory ModifierSymbol = int32(27)

summary.span: 表示修改周圍字元的修飾詞符號字元。

span.span: Modifier symbol character, which indicates modifications of surrounding characters.

summary.span: 例如，分數斜線表示左邊數字為分子，右邊數字為分母。

span.span: For example, the fraction slash indicates that the number to the left is the numerator and the number to the right is the denominator.

summary.span: 指標是以 Unicode 指定 "Sk" 表示 (符號、修飾詞)。

span.span: The indicator is signified by the Unicode designation "Sk" (symbol, modifier).

summary.span: 值為 27。

span.span: The value is 27.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory NonSpacingMark = int32(5)

summary.span: 表示修改基底字元的非間距字元。

span.span: Nonspacing character that indicates modifications of a base character.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Mn" 表示 (記號、非間距)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Mn" (mark, nonspacing).

summary.span: 值為 5。

span.span: The value is 5.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory OpenPunctuation = int32(20)

summary.span: 一個成對標點符號的開啟字元 (例如括弧、方括弧和大括弧)。

span.span: Opening character of one of the paired punctuation marks, such as parentheses, square brackets, and braces.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Ps" 表示 (標點符號、開啟)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Ps" (punctuation, open).

summary.span: 值為 20。

span.span: The value is 20.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory OtherLetter = int32(4)

summary.span: 不是大寫字母、小寫字母、字首大寫字母或修飾詞字母的字母。

span.span: Letter that is not an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a titlecase letter, or a modifier letter.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Lo" 表示 (字母、其他)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Lo" (letter, other).

summary.span: 值為 4。

span.span: The value is 4.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory OtherNotAssigned = int32(29)

summary.span: 未指派給任何 Unicode 分類的字元。

span.span: Character that is not assigned to any Unicode category.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Cn" 表示 (其他、未指派)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Cn" (other, not assigned).

summary.span: 值為 29。

span.span: The value is 29.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory OtherNumber = int32(10)

summary.span: 不是十進位數字也不是字母數字的數字 (例如，分數 1/2)。

span.span: Number that is neither a decimal digit nor a letter number, for example, the fraction 1/2.

summary.span: 指標是以 Unicode 指定 "No" 表示 (數字、其他)。

span.span: The indicator is signified by the Unicode designation "No" (number, other).

summary.span: 值為 10。

span.span: The value is 10.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory OtherPunctuation = int32(24)

summary.span: 不是連接線、破折號、開啟標點符號、關閉標點符號、初始引號或最終引號的標點符號字元。

span.span: Punctuation character that is not a connector, a dash, open punctuation, close punctuation, an initial quote, or a final quote.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Po" 表示 (標點符號、其他)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Po" (punctuation, other).

summary.span: 值為 24。

span.span: The value is 24.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory OtherSymbol = int32(28)

summary.span: 不是數學符號、貨幣符號或修飾詞符號的符號字元。

span.span: Symbol character that is not a mathematical symbol, a currency symbol or a modifier symbol.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "So" 表示 (符號、其他)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "So" (symbol, other).

summary.span: 值為 28。

span.span: The value is 28.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory ParagraphSeparator = int32(13)

summary.span: 用來分隔段落的字元。

span.span: Character used to separate paragraphs.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Zp" 表示 (分隔符號、段落)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Zp" (separator, paragraph).

summary.span: 值為 13。

span.span: The value is 13.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory PrivateUse = int32(17)

summary.span: Unicode 值落在 U+E000 到 U+F8FF 範圍內的私用字元。

span.span: Private-use character, with a Unicode value in the range U+E000 through U+F8FF.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Co" 表示 (其他、私用)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Co" (other, private use).

summary.span: 值為 17。

span.span: The value is 17.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory SpaceSeparator = int32(11)

summary.span: 沒有字符也不是控制或格式字元的空白字元。

span.span: Space character, which has no glyph but is not a control or format character.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Zs" 表示 (分隔符號、空格)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Zs" (separator, space).

summary.span: 值為 11。

span.span: The value is 11.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory SpacingCombiningMark = int32(6)

summary.span: 間距字元，表示修改基底字元並影響該基底字元字符寬度。

span.span: Spacing character that indicates modifications of a base character and affects the width of the glyph for that base character.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Mc" 表示 (記號、間距組合)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Mc" (mark, spacing combining).

summary.span: 值為 6。

span.span: The value is 6.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory Surrogate = int32(16)

summary.span: 高 Surrogate 或低 Surrogate 字元。

span.span: High surrogate or a low surrogate character.

summary.span: Surrogate 字碼值落在 U+D800 到 U+DFFF 的範圍內。

span.span: Surrogate code values are in the range U+D800 through U+DFFF.

summary.span: 以 Unicode 指定 "Cs" 表示 (其他、Surrogate)。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Cs" (other, surrogate).

summary.span: 值為 16。

span.span: The value is 16.
